item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，Meta 正在洽谈由 Apollo 领投的 350 亿美元数据中心融资项目
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周四援引知情人士的话报道，阿波罗全球管理公司（Apollo Global Management）正在洽谈牵头为 Meta Platforms 公司提供约 350 亿美元的一揽子融资计划，以帮助该公司在美国开发数据中心。【原文：Apollo Global Management is in talks to lead a roughly $35 billion financing package for Meta Platforms to help develop data centers in the U.S., Bloomberg News reported on Thursday citing people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 美联储主席哈马克称利率可能会维持一段时间
item.description: 克利夫兰联邦储备银行行长贝丝-哈马克（Beth Hammack）周四表示，她预计美国央行将暂时搁置利率政策，以寻找通胀压力正在缓解并回到2%目标的证据。【原文：Federal Reserve Bank of Cleveland President Beth Hammack said on Thursday she expects U.S. central bank interest rate policy is on hold for the time being amid a hunt for evidence that inflation pressures are easing back to the 2% target.】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，特斯拉正在寻求批准在加州提供叫车服务
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周四报道，特斯拉正在寻求批准在加利福尼亚州提供叫车服务，这是埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的公司在其传统汽车销售业务摇摇欲坠时开始承载付费客户的关键一步。【原文：Tesla is seeking approval to offer ride-hailing services in California, a key step by Elon Musk's company to begin carrying paying customers while its traditional car-selling business falters, Bloomberg News reported on Thursday.】

item.title: 消息人士称，制裁和关税令欧佩克+对四月石油涨价犹豫不决
item.description: 欧佩克+组织的八位消息人士称，由于美国对委内瑞拉、伊朗和俄罗斯实施了新的制裁，欧佩克+组织的成员国正在努力解读全球供应形势，因此欧佩克+组织正在争论是按计划提高四月份的石油产量，还是冻结产量。【原文：OPEC+ is debating whether to raise oil output in April as planned or freeze it as its members struggle to read the global supply picture because of fresh U.S. sanctions on Venezuela, Iran and Russia, eight OPEC+ sources said.】

item.title: 美国联邦储蓄委员会驳回针对伯克希尔公司高风险住房贷款的诉讼
item.description: 美国消费者金融保护局（U.S. Consumer Financial Protection Bureau）驳回了指控沃伦-巴菲特（Warren Buffett）的伯克希尔-哈撒韦公司（Berkshire Hathaway）旗下的范德比尔特抵押贷款与金融公司（Vanderbilt Mortgage and Finance）向借款人发放他们无力负担的贷款，以购买伯克希尔旗下克莱顿住宅公司（Clayton Homes）的房屋的诉讼。【原文：The U.S. Consumer Financial Protection Bureau dismissed its lawsuit accusing Vanderbilt Mortgage and Finance, a unit of Warren Buffett's Berkshire Hathaway , of driving borrowers into loans they could not afford to buy homes from Berkshire's Clayton Homes unit.】

item.title: 特朗普取消石油开采许可证可能加剧委内瑞拉通货膨胀
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）取消了外国石油公司在受制裁的委内瑞拉的经营许可，这将减少该国外汇市场上的美元供应，从而刺激当地玻利瓦尔货币贬值和物价上涨。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump's cancellation of licenses for foreign oil companies to operate in sanctioned Venezuela will reduce the dollars on offer in the country's exchange market, stoking depreciation of the local bolivar currency and prices, analysts said on Thursday.】

item.title: 前商务部官员表示，将对违反出口规定的公司处以巨额罚款
item.description: 据上月离职的一位美国商务部高级官员称，美国商务部可能在未来几个月内对一些大公司处以巨额罚款，这些公司的违法行为包括非法向中国客户运送技术。【原文：The U.S. Commerce Department is likely to impose hefty fines on some large companies in the coming months for offenses such as illegally shipping technology to customers in China, according to a top department official who left last month.】

item.title: 拉巴纳品牌所有者 Puig 成为上市公司的第一年，利润就增长了 14
item.description: 香水品牌拉巴纳（Rabanne）、卡罗琳娜-赫雷拉（Carolina Herrera）和让-保罗-高缇耶（Jean Paul Gaultier）背后的西班牙美容公司普伊格（Puig）周四公布，2024 年净利润增长 14%，略低于分析师对其作为上市公司第一年业绩的预期。【原文：Puig , the Spanish beauty company behind perfume brands Rabanne, Carolina Herrera and Jean Paul Gaultier, reported a 14% rise in 2024 net profit on Thursday, slightly missing analyst expectations in its first year as a listed company.】

item.title: 格鲁吉亚在街头抗议镇压中购买以色列数据提取技术
item.description: 采购文件显示，格鲁吉亚已着手与以色列技术公司 Cellebrite DI 有限公司续签合同，购买用于从移动设备中提取数据的软件，因为该国正在努力应对持续不断的反政府街头抗议活动。【原文：Georgia has moved to renew contracts with Israeli technology firm Cellebrite DI Ltd for software used to extract data from mobile devices, procurement documents show, as the country grapples with ongoing anti-government street protests.】

item.title: Teleperformance 经过一年的整合后，收入增长加速
item.description: 法国 Teleperformance 呼叫中心和办公服务集团周四表示，得益于两次收购和人工智能合作伙伴关系的整合，该公司预计今年的销售额将加速增长，此前该公司 2024 年的收入超过了市场预期。【原文：France's Teleperformance expects faster sales growth this year thanks to the consolidation of two acquisitions and AI partnerships, the call centre and office services group said on Thursday, after beating market expectations for 2024 revenue.】

item.title: 美国商务部提名人称台积电为华为制造芯片的报道 "令人严重关切
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）提名的负责监督中国出口政策的职位人选周四称，有关台湾半导体制造股份有限公司（Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Co）为华为生产数十万颗芯片的报道 "非常令人担忧"。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump's nominee to a post overseeing export policy for China on Thursday called a report about Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Co producing hundreds of thousands of chips for Huawei "a huge concern."】

item.title: 缪西娅-普拉达称 "所有人 "都有意收购范思哲
item.description: 意大利奢侈品集团普拉达（Prada）的所有者缪西娅-普拉达（Miuccia Prada）周四表示，许多时装公司都可能有意收购范思哲。【原文：Numerous fashion companies are potentially interested in buying Versace, Miuccia Prada, owner of the Italian luxury group Prada , said on Thursday.】

item.title: 瑞士因摩根士丹利 2010 年洗钱案罚款 100 万美元
item.description: 瑞士总检察长办公室周四表示，已对摩根士丹利在瑞士的业务处以 100 万美元的罚款，原因是摩根士丹利未能采取足够措施防止其一名客户顾问在 2010 年实施合格的洗钱行为。【原文：The Swiss attorney general's office said on Thursday it had imposed a $1 million fine on Morgan Stanley's Swiss operations for failing to do enough to prevent one of its client advisors committing qualified money laundering in 2010.】

item.title: 福克斯公司任命 Pete Distad 为新订阅流媒体平台负责人
item.description: 福克斯公司周四任命前 Apple TV+ 高管 Pete Distad 担任其即将推出的订阅流媒体平台的首席执行官，该平台将与 Netflix 和 Disney+ 等公司竞争。【原文：Fox Corp on Thursday named former Apple TV+ executive Pete Distad as the CEO of its upcoming subscription streaming platform, which will take on the likes of Netflix and Disney+.】

item.title: 道富确认推出 SPDR 阿波罗私人信贷 ETF
item.description: 州立街全球顾问公司（State Street Global Advisors）表示，其与另类投资公司阿波罗全球管理公司（Apollo Global Management）联合开发的备受瞩目的私人信贷交易所交易基金已于周四上午开始交易。【原文：State Street Global Advisors said its much-anticipated private credit exchange-traded fund, developed in conjunction with alternatives investment firm Apollo Global Management, began trading on Thursday morning.】

item.title: 日本央行行长警告美国关税带来强烈的全球不确定性
item.description: 日本央行行长上田一夫周四警告说，全球经济前景存在 "非常强烈 "的不确定性，需要在制定货币政策时保持警惕。【原文：Bank of Japan Governor Kazuo Ueda on Thursday warned of "very strong" uncertainty on the global economic outlook that required vigilance in setting monetary policy.】

item.title: 美国 CFPB 撤销对 Capital One 的执法行动
item.description: 美国消费者金融保护局（U.S. Consumer Financial Protection Bureau）周四撤销了对第一资本公司（Capital One）的法律诉讼，该机构上个月曾指控该公司在储蓄账户上骗取了消费者超过 20 亿美元的利息。【原文：The U.S. Consumer Financial Protection Bureau on Thursday dropped a legal action against Capital One , which the agency had accused last month of cheating consumers out of more than $2 billion in interest payments on savings accounts.】

item.title: 美国联邦通信委员会推进无线频谱拍卖以资助中国设备搬迁
item.description: 美国联邦通信委员会周四投票决定推进无线频谱拍卖，为美国电信公司提供近 31 亿美元，用于从美国无线网络中移除中国电信公司华为和中兴生产的设备，以应对安全风险。【原文：The Federal Communications Commission voted on Thursday to advance a wireless spectrum auction to provide nearly $3.1 billion for U.S. telecom companies to remove equipment made by Chinese telecoms firms Huawei and ZTE from American wireless networks to address security risks.】

item.title: 欧洲央行将于 3 月 6 日再次降息，重点转向经济增长：路透社民意调查
item.description: 路透社调查的所有 82 位经济学家均预计，欧洲央行将在下周再次下调存款利率至 2.50%，并将在今年年中之前再下调两次。【原文：The European Central Bank will trim its deposit rate again next week to 2.50%, according to all 82 economists polled by Reuters who expected two further cuts by the middle of this year.】

item.title: 文件显示，利安德将在即将关闭的休斯顿炼油厂裁员 86
item.description: 利安德巴塞尔工业公司（Lyondell Basell Industries）向德克萨斯州劳动力委员会（Texas Workforce Commission）提交的一份文件显示，该公司将于 4 月 17 日在其关闭的休斯顿炼油厂裁员 345 人。【原文：Lyondell Basell Industries' will lay off 345 workers at its shuttered Houston refinery on April 17, according to a filing with the Texas Workforce Commission.】

item.title: 意大利总理梅洛尼会见梅塔公司总裁讨论投资事宜
item.description: 意大利总理乔治亚-梅洛尼（Giorgia Meloni）办公室周四表示，意大利总理会见了美国科技巨头 Meta 公司的首席全球事务官乔尔-卡普兰（Joel Kaplan），讨论在意大利进行新投资的可能性。【原文：Italian Prime Minister Giorgia Meloni met Joel Kaplan, the chief global affairs officer of U.S. tech giant Meta , to discuss possible new investments in Italy, Meloni's office said on Thursday.】

item.title: Verizon美国联邦航空局系统危及美国空中安全，星际链路所有者马斯克说
item.description: 埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）周四表示，由威瑞森公司（Verizon）运营的美国联邦航空管理局（Federal Aviation Administration）通信系统还有几个月就将出现故障，危及航空安全。【原文：Elon Musk on Thursday said a U.S, Federal Aviation Administration communication system operated by Verizon is months away from failure and putting air safety at risks.】

item.title: 苹果公司因手表 "碳中和 "声明遭起诉
item.description: 苹果公司被消费者起诉，称其三个版本的苹果手表 "碳中和 "和环保的说法是虚假和误导性的。【原文：Apple has been sued by consumers who said its claim that three versions of Apple Watches are "carbon neutral" and environmentally friendly is false and misleading.】

item.title: 消息人士称，雪佛龙公司许可证终止可能导致委内瑞拉达成新的石油出口协议
item.description: 接近谈判的消息人士称，取消雪佛龙公司在委内瑞拉的经营许可可能会促使这家美国生产商与委内瑞拉国家石油公司（PDVSA）谈判达成新的协议，向美国以外的目的地出口原油。【原文：The cancellation of a license for Chevron to operate in Venezuela could lead to the negotiation of a fresh agreement between the U.S. producer and state company PDVSA to export crude to destinations other than the United States, sources close to the talks said.】

item.title: 哥伦比亚首次海上风能拍卖吸引全球兴趣
item.description: 南美国家国家油气署（ANH）周四表示，在哥伦比亚首次海上风能拍卖中，来自世界各地的公司已提议开发 69 个海上区域。【原文：Companies from around the world have proposed to develop 69 offshore areas in Colombia's first offshore wind energy auction, the South American country's National Hydrocarbons Agency (ANH) said on Thursday.】

item.title: 巴西食品加工商称 2025 年食品销售额超预期
item.description: 上市肉类加工商巴西食品公司（BRF）高管周四表示，今年前两个月巴西的食品销售超出预期，该公司计划扩大加工食品的生产，以从强劲的需求中获取收入。【原文：Listed meat processor BRF said on Thursday food sales exceeded expectations in the first two months of the year in Brazil, with the company planning to expand production of processed foods to capture revenue from strong demand, executives said on Thursday.】

item.title: 墨西哥 Femsa 公司净利润翻番后股价大涨
item.description: 墨西哥 Femsa 公司周四早盘股价上涨约 7%，此前该公司报告称，2024 年第四季度净利润比上年同期增长了一倍多。【原文：Shares of Mexico's Femsa gained about 7% in early trading on Thursday, after the company reported that its net profit more than doubled in the fourth quarter of 2024 compared with the same period a year earlier.】

item.title: 美国 1 月成屋待售量跌至历史新低
item.description: 由于较高的抵押贷款利率和房价降低了潜在买家的承受能力，1 月份美国旧房购买合同骤降至历史最低点。【原文：Contracts to buy U.S. previously owned homes plunged to a record low in January as higher mortgage rates and house prices reduced affordability for prospective buyers.】

item.title: 美国众议院小组就对外通信问题传讯科技巨头
item.description: 美国众议院司法委员会周四表示，已传唤八家主要科技公司，包括 Alphabet、Meta、苹果和 X 公司，要求它们提供与其他国家就遵守影响言论的法律进行沟通的详细情况。【原文：The U.S. House Judiciary Committee has subpoenaed eight major technology companies, including Alphabet, Meta, Apple and X Corp, seeking details about their communications with other countries regarding compliance with laws impacting speech, it said on Thursday.】

item.title: 高盛调整多元化政策
item.description: 华尔街银行高盛（Goldman Sachs）周四表示，已根据美国法律的某些发展调整了其多元化举措。【原文：Goldman Sachs has tweaked its diversity initiatives in light of certain developments in the law in the U.S., the Wall Street bank said on Thursday.】
